divs: Sighting DetailsI was coming home, distracted, night, overcast sky, with the streetlights reflecting in my face, so I looked at a bright star on the horizon, similar to "Dalva" star, for about a minute, and suddenly this star fell, forming a glowing trail in the sky.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Brasilia
There were no other sightings in Brasilia on or around December 5th 2012
Summary: I looked at a bright star on the horizon and suddenly this star fell, forming a glowing trail in the sky
